short.en: Allow SSO agains multiple external identity providers using SAML2.

long.en:
This plugin is a 'rewrite' of Derrick Smiths phpsaml plugin. It is written for GLPI10 and later. The plugin uses GLPI core objects where possible. It follows the PSR best practices, composer, twig, PHPSAML and much more. Glpisaml allows you to configure multiple external SAML identity providers using the GLPI interface for SSO. It allows you to configure bypasses and rights rules on user creation.
Want to help build a helpfull GLPI community, join at our discord and offer support and insight at: https://discord.gg/35tkHxHg
